original_title: Germany’s Merz facing opposition over Ukraine troop plan – Bild — RT World News
article_summary: US-Russia Summit in Anchorage marks a shift from Cold War confrontation to cautious coexistence, with the first in-person meeting between leaders Trump and Putin since 2021 potentially leading to further talks on global issues. The meeting, despite appearing distant, was warmer and more constructive, signaling a thaw in long-frozen communication channels.</s>
